entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
